title: Hi, I'm Samuel, a Full-Stack Dev.
subtitle: Owner of Ânime Solutions
radar-description: Local news portal dedicated to multiple regions of Rio de Janeiro — including the West Zone, Baixada Fluminense, and South Zone. Currently under development, the project is designed with a strong focus on security, flexibility, scalability, and a smart news management system.
carnaval-app-description: Official app of Rio de Janeiro’s Carnival. It offers user registration, a full administrative dashboard, and access to everything about the world’s greatest festival. Its highlight is the popular voting system, which leverages location and device data to ensure authenticity and transparency. The platform also features real-time monitoring and analytics, along with an intelligent queuing system for vote submissions, preventing overload and API call blocking.
